to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: Definitely unslung
body:
Thanks.  I was just wondering.  It is really interesting, but, as Isaid earlier, I do not understand anything about hardware.  I knowwhat power is, I know what heat is, and now, I understand why thebattery on here will not last much longer than a couple of hours, evenif it is a lithium/ion battery.  I don'\u062b really know what kind it is,but you answered my question.  


Thank you. 



-- Spie Smith: C.S.F.C.Computer Scientist For CHRIST
